ui_ctrl_lmb: Quickly move stack items to another inventory (first right inventory)
ui_shift_drag: Split the item quantity in half
ui_ctrl_shift_lmb: Quickly move half a stack of items to another inventory (first right inventory)
ui_ctrl_c: When you highlight a gun, it copies the serial number
inventory_player_access: You cannot access your inventory right now
inventory_right_access: You cannot access this inventory right now
inventory_lost_access: You do not have access to these inventories anymore
can_not_afford: You don't have enough money for %s
weapon_registered: %s (%s) is registered in the name of %s
give_amount: You must enter the amount you want to give
buy_amount: You must enter the amount you want to buy
cannot_carry: You cannot carry this amount on you
item_unauthorised: You are not authorized to purchase this item
item_unlicensed: You are not licensed to purchase this item
cannot_afford: You cannot afford this quantity (Quantity required: %s)
stash_lowgrade: You are not authorized to take this item
locker_no_value: Must contain value to open locker
weapon_hand_required: You must have a weapon in your hands
weapon_hand_wrong: You are holding the wrong weapon
cannot_give: You failed to give %s %s to person.
evidence_cannot_take: You are not authorized to take items from the evidence room
